name: Tomb Raider - Triad
text:
2+ Level 3 Monsters
If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can equip "Raiding Tool" cards from your GY to this card up to the number of Xyz Materials attached to this card. You can detach 1 Xyz material and banish 1 "Raiding Tool" card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Tomb Raider" monster from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Tomb Raider - Triad" once per turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Equip Spell equipped to this card; Return it to the hand then destroy 1 face-up card your opponent controls. You cannot Summon monsters except "Tomb Raider" monsters.
